mapper.update:
update waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_info_id = #{jobInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info set model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_info_id = #{jobInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info.id, waterfall_job_info.id AS jobInfoId, waterfall_job_info.task_name AS taskName, waterfall_job_info.task_corn AS taskCorn, waterfall_job_info.trigger_status AS triggerStatus, waterfall_job_info.create_time AS createTime FROM waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info INNER JOIN waterfall_job_info ON waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info.job_info_id = waterfall_job_info.id WHERE waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info.model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT waterfall_job_info.id AS jobInfoId, waterfall_job_info.task_name AS taskName, waterfall_job_info.task_corn AS taskCorn, waterfall_job_info.trigger_status AS triggerStatus, waterfall_job_info.create_time AS createTime FROM waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info INNER JOIN waterfall_job_info ON waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info.job_info_id = waterfall_job_info.id WHERE waterfall_quality_model_with_job_info.job_info_id = #{jobInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
